participant_1.background:
I have been eavesdropping on my neighbors for many years, but the weather has never been a factor.
I love spending time with my alpacas.
I procrastinate on my lesson plans.
i do not like to eat meat.
i never sleep in.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy watching game shows and designing clothes in my spare time.
i drive a ford mustang.
people say i have a cute laugh.
i am lusting after the neighbour pool boy.
My most valued material possession is my travel journal, filled with memories of my adventures and furry friends.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a huge animal lover! What are your favorite animals?
I love cats! I have two of them. What are your pets?
I have alpacas! They are some of the cutest creatures I know of.
I've never seen an alpaca before! What are they like?
They're very social animals and they love to play. They're also really soft and fluffy!
They sound adorable! I'd love to see one someday.
You should! They're really great animals.
I'm definitely going to look into it!
What are some of your other interests?
I love to watch game shows and design clothes. I also love to travel!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to travel too. What's your favorite place you've ever been?
I love going to the beach! I love the sound of the waves and the feeling of the sand between my toes.
That sounds so relaxing! I love the beach too.
I'm glad! I'm sure we'd get along great.
